data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Mayo-Kebbi Ouest prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mayo-Kebbi Ouest, Chad
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Mayo-Kebbi Ouest, Chad a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Mayo-Kebbi Ouest, Chad.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Mayo-Kebbi Ouest.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 41,423 believers in the state of Mayo-Kebbi Ouest the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Fulbe, Fulani people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, call those who are far off in Mayo-Kebbi Ouest, Chad, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Mayo-Kebbi Ouest, Chad to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Mayo-Kebbi Ouest, Chad to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
